en-US.name: InterviewMe
en-US.description:
Say "Alexa, open InterviewMe" and get prepared to ace your next job/internship or college interview!
InterviewMe can offer interview tips, sample interview questions, and even simulate an entire interview.
To start, just say "Alexa, open Interview Me" to start practicing. You can say things like "interview tips", "ask me a coding question", or "simulate technical interview". You can stop at any time by saying "Alexa, stop."

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Start the skill with 'Alexa, open interview me'. Then the options are tips and questions for 5 categories (general, coding, technical, business, and college) and full interview simulation for 4 categories (general, technical, business, and college).
